title: Steelseries Stratus+ unboxing and key features: Ultimate Android gaming controller? [Video]
content:
Steelseries has a rich history of making high-quality gaming accessories, and that continues with the Stratus+. Designed specifically for Android and Chromebook usage, just why is this a great gaming companion for services like NVIDIA GeForce NOW? Here are some of the key functions and features.
